Package hxasjc.utilstuff.ansi

Class AnsiTextColours

java.lang.Object
hxasjc.utilstuff.ansi.AnsiTextColours
All Implemented Interfaces:
ANSI
public class AnsiTextColours extends Object implements ANSI
Contains the escape sequences and methods for ANSI text colours

  • Method Details

    • get256Colour

      public static String get256Colour(int id, AnsiTextColours.ColourMode mode)
      Get a colour from the set of 256. print256ColourTable() prints out a table of these colours
      Parameters:
      id - The colour id
      mode - Foreground/text or background/highlight
      Returns:
      An ANSI escape sequence representing the colour

    • getRgbColour

      public static String getRgbColour(int r, int g, int b, AnsiTextColours.ColourMode mode)
      Get an RGB colour
      Parameters:
      r - The red amount
      g - The green amount
      b - The blue amount
      mode - Foreground/text or background/highlight
      Returns:
      An ANSI escape sequence representing the colour

    • getBasicColour

      public static String getBasicColour(AnsiTextColours.BaseColour colour, AnsiTextColours.ColourMode mode, boolean bright)
      Get one of the basic colours. Used to generate the constant colours
      Parameters:
      colour - Name of the colour
      mode - Foreground/text or background/highlight
      bright - Whether to create a bright colour or normal
      Returns:
      An ANSI escape sequence representing the colour

    • print256ColourTable

      public static void print256ColourTable()
      Prints out the set of 256 colours
